templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: I can check if that's possible. What's the order number, email address and the change you'd like to make?

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at support@surebonder.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that but if it helps, you can check out the items we have on sale here: https://surebonder.com/collections/clearance-glue-guns

templates.name: Social Media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/surebonder/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/surebonder

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship / affiliate program
templates.content: The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at support@surebonder.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Return Policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here - https://surebonder.com/policies/refund-policy

templates.name: Customer Support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at support@surebonder.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Free Shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $60. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: Where are your items made / manufactured?
templates.content: We make all of our glue products in our state of the art manufacturing facility in Wauconda, Illinois.

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: You can take a look at our official retailers here: https://surebonder.com/pages/retailers

templates.name: Shipping Time
templates.content: Our processing time takes 2 business days and we usually ship via USPS or UPS. Once shipped, it will take 5-7 business days for domestic orders.

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at (847) 487-4583 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.
